title: No One Lives Forever Collection (PC Games)
description:
NO ONE LIVES FOREVER COLLECTION - Uploaded by _Firefly on thepiratebay.org
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
This is a collection of all the No One Lives Forever series in one download!

Includes:
-No One Lives Forever GOTY
-No One Lives Forever 2: A Spy in H.A.R.M.S Way
-Contract J.A.C.K.

All work with Windows 10 and include patches and CD keys.
These games are somewhat hard to find due to them not being sold anywhere, so please seed!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION: 

No One Lives Forever GOTY & No One Lives Forever 2:
Run the exe installer, and simply install it. A cmd window will come up to install patches and such.
After that, just run the game and play!

Contract J.A.C.K.:
Mount the iso, and run autorun.exe and install. When asked for a CD key, go into the Crack folder and open the CD key txt file.
When prompted to insert another disc, just click OK. After installation is completed, go into the Crack folder of the disc, run the 
patch setup installation, if it tells you the game's language is wrong, run some of the registry files in the registry folder of the chosen
language. After the patch setup, copy over "Lithtech.exe" to the games directory and replace the original one. Then run the game and play!
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Enjoy the collection of this series of great games! PLEASE SEED!
